mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT POPUP_BOARD.*, ROWNUM AS rnum FROM ( SELECT * FROM POPUP_BOARD ORDER BY postdate DESC ) POPUP_BOARD WHERE ROWNUM <= 8 )
SELECT * FROM POPUP_BOARD WHERE category = #{category} ORDER BY postdate DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POPUP_BOARD (board_idx, board_title, contents, popup_fee, start_date, end_date, popup_addr, category, writer, role) VALUES (NULL, #{board_title}, #{contents}, #{popup_fee}, #{start_date}, #{end_date}, #{popup_addr}, #{category}, #{writer}, #{role})
